plugin.name: MeteorCordova
plugin.description: This plugin allows Meteor to run remotely inside Cordova and accessing events and the native scope. It also includes some fallbacks so that the Meteor code can run the same with or without the notification plugins. This allows Meteor to run inside both browsers and cordova.
plugin.info:
Remeber to checkout the documentation on https://github.com/raix/Meteor-Cordova
You have to initialize the MeteorCordava, reference the added html files example.html and fallback.html
plugin.author: Morten Henriksen aka RaiX
